Title: Summer Wars
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Mamoru Hosoda (original story), Satoko Okudera (screenplay), John Burgmeier (head writer), Patrick Seitz (script writer)
Actors: Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Nanami Sakuraba, Mitsuki Tanimura, Takahiro Yokokawa
Plot: Kenji Koiso, an eleventh grade math genius, agrees to take a summer job at the Nagano hometown of his crush, Natuski. When he arrives, he finds that her family have reunited to celebrate the 90th birthday of the family matriarch. His job is to pretend to be Natsuki's fiancé. Meanwhile, his attempt to solve a mathematical equation causes a parallel world's collision with earth.
